name: Project Monster
description:
Project Monster is a 2D adventure game. The player needs to play the role of a monster to complete the tasks given by the mysterious person, survive several different ten seconds, and finally find a new self……  

There will be several 10 seconds tasks given to the player. If the player can’t finish in 10 seconds, there will be thorn falling to kill the player and make them repeat and repeat in every 10 seconds. 

Gameplay video:

Control Guide:

Press A or D to move. Press Space to jump. Press R to roll. Press E to continue the dialogue.

Launch yourself: Keep pressing R, and then use your left mouse button to click somewhere higher than yourself.

Click above the player, the monster can jump very high. Click at the 45-degree axis, the monster can move farther.

If you release S in the middle of sky, the monster will fall.

If you press A or D to move at the moment of release, there will be a certain shift.
